make_bubbles_pop.midnightconfig.BIOME_CO:
Tints all bubble types depending on the water color. 
Default: §aYes§f
make_bubbles_pop.midnightconfig.BUBBLE_L:
The time it takes for a bubble to pop underwater. 
By default, this is set longer than in vanilla to allow bubbles to reach the water surface. 
Default: §b32.0§f §7(Vanilla: 8.0)§f
make_bubbles_pop.midnightconfig.BUBBLE_P:
Enables overhauled bubble physics when colliding with blocks or entities. 
Default: §aYes§f 
§dℹ Note:§f This does not currently work for bubbles from soul sand or magma blocks.
make_bubbles_pop.midnightconfig.CHEST_BU:
Default: §aYes§f 
§dℹ Note:§f Make sure to disable this or Effective's implementation if Effective is installed.
make_bubbles_pop.midnightconfig.CONTAINE: └ Enable sound when opening chests or barrels underwater
make_bubbles_pop.midnightconfig.EXPLOSIO:
Default: §aYes§f 
§dℹ Note:§f Make sure to disable this or Explosive Enhancement's implementation if Explosive Enhancement is installed.
make_bubbles_pop.midnightconfig.POPPED_B: └ Maintain bubble velocity for bubble pop particles
make_bubbles_pop.midnightconfig.POP_PART:
Default: §aYes§f 
§dℹ Note:§f Make sure to disable this or Particle Tweaks' implementation if Particle Tweaks is installed.
make_bubbles_pop.midnightconfig.title: Make Bubbles Pop Configuration
modmenu.summaryTranslation.make_bubbles_: Makes bubble particles pop and lets them rise to the water surface.
